content: hat pattern switch to larger needles us size 8 row 13 *knit* row 14 *lt k2 lt rt* row 15 *knit* row 16 k1 *lt k2 rt k2* until last 7 stitches then lt k2 rt k1 row 17 *knit* row 18 *rt lt rt k2* row 19 knit until the last stitch slip the last stitch purl-wise remove the marker slip the stitch back onto the left needle do an rt both stitches are now on the right needle slip the first stitch on the right needle back onto the left needle pm for the beginning of the round slip that same stitch back onto the right needle you re basically removing the marker doing an rt and then putting the marker back between the two stitches and continuing on to row 20 starting with the second stitch of the round row 20 the marker and first stitch are already on the right needle *k2 lt k2 rt* until last 7 stitches then k2 lt k3 row 21 *knit* repeat row 14 21 four more times for a total of 5 repeats row 54 repeat row 14 row 55 *knit* row 56 repeat row 16 row 57 *knit* crown shaping row 58 *k2tog lt k2tog k2* row 59 *knit* row 60 *rt ssk k2* row 61 *knit* row 62 k2tog *ssk k2tog k1* until last three stitches then ssk k1 row 63 *knit* row 64 *k1 ssk* row 65 *knit* row 66 k1 *ssk* k1 cut yarn and use a yarn needle to slip the remaining active stitches through the yarn tail weave in ends and enjoy
